DOC.brief_summary: In U.S. , rate preterm birth low birth weight increase past 30 year . Poor birth outcome especially high among racial/ethnic minority population . Maternal stress important factor lead negative birth outcome . Thus , program reduce stress pregnancy could improve birth outcome . Initial pilot work test mindfulness-based approach stress reduction pregnancy . Women pilot study low stress improve cop program . For current study , mindfulness add exist prenatal healthcare program call CenteringPregnancy ( CP ) . CP provide prenatal care 10 group session . This study compare CP version CP infuse mindfulness skill train . Effects two version CP psychological stress coping , stress hormone , birth outcomes test . Data collect participant three time : twice pregnancy birth . Medical record provide data birth outcomes health factor . The study provide initial information mind-body program reduce stress improve birth outcome . Data study inform development R01 proposal large study . The study also help advance long term goal reduce health disparity .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Trial CenteringPregnancy With Mindfulness Skills
DOC.criteria: age 18 enrol receive groupbased prenatal healthcare San Francisco General Hospital ( SFGH ) Outpatient Midwifery Clinic CenteringPregnancy program ineligible CenteringPregnancy due need individualize prenatal care Type 2 diabetes HIV seizure disorder serious mental health disorder substance abuse medical condition would lead inability adhere intervention guideline fluent English Spanish previous formal training meditation , yoga , mindbody practice previous participation CenteringPregnancy
